Description: Technology stack recommendations with rationale for frontend/backend/database/cloud/APIs/authentication. Reference before any technical decisions.
Project objectives/deliverables/constraints/assumptions/dependencies/timelines. Defines boundaries of what will/won't be built.
Complete feature list with user stories and acceptance criteria organized by priority (Primary/Secondary/Optional). Use for development tasks.
API endpoint documentation with request/response examples and integration notes. Reference when building backend or integrating with Ooredoo.
PostgreSQL database schema with tables/relationships/indexes/sample queries. Use when setting up database.
Navigation flows/wireframes/UI components/design specifications. Reference when building user interface.
Phase-by-phase Cursor instructions with explicit file cross-references. Master guide for development execution.
This file - dependency map and execution order for entire project.
Create Gambo.ai Professional account ($199/month) and verify email. Prerequisites for all development.
Create Gambo.ai project with mobile portrait configuration. Use AI prompts from execution guide.
Send design brief to contractors for ship skins and enemy sprites. Budget: $8K-12K.
Send audio brief to contractors for music/SFX/voice. Budget: $3K-5K.
Validate Ooredoo API endpoints and obtain test credentials. Contact technical team.
Execute PostgreSQL creation scripts and verify connection. Test with sample data.
Implement tap-to-shoot/enemy formation/scoring using Gambo.ai AI prompts. Week 2 focus.
Import ship/enemy sprites and configure particle effects in Gambo.ai. Requires assets from Phase 1.
Implement 6 power-up types with token management and API integration. Week 3 focus.
Build rank calculation logic and unlock system. Week 3 focus.
Create mission generation/tracking system with midnight reset. Week 3 focus.
Build leaderboard rankings with Redis caching and real-time updates. Week 4 focus.
Implement points conversion with multipliers and transaction logging. Week 4 focus.
Test on 15+ devices (iOS/Android) and validate performance targets. Week 5 focus.
Execute 100+ test cases covering all features. Target >95% pass rate. Week 5 focus.
Deploy to 500 Ooredoo staff testers via TestFlight/Google Play Internal. Week 6 focus.
Configure Gambo.ai/Mixpanel/Google Analytics tracking. Monitor beta metrics. Week 6 focus.
Triage bugs (P0/P1/P2/P3) and adjust difficulty based on beta data. Ongoing Week 6.
Configure production database/Redis/CDN and deploy APIs. Week 7 focus.
Prepare screenshots/videos/descriptions and submit iOS/Android updates. Week 7-8 focus.
Execute pre-launch teasers and launch day social media blitz. Week 8-9 focus.
Create FAQ and troubleshooting guide for support team. Week 8 focus.
Real-time tracking of metrics/performance/social sentiment on launch day. Week 9 Day 1.
Monitor DAU/retention/crashes daily. Review metrics weekly. Ongoing maintenance.
Monthly new ship skins. Quarterly seasonal events. Deploy via Gambo.ai OTA.
Quarterly review of frame rate/load time/API speed. Optimize as needed.
Plan Year 2 features (friends/tournaments/new modes) based on Year 1 data.
